channel.title: Need help, to a 562!
channel.description:
Hey everyone!
I need help to get my client into a DL link, right now, you need Khanz 562 Ip changer, to get on my DL, i want an easier way to get on it..
1. I need to get it on a DL Link S:
2. I need to maybe get it on Runelocus
3. I need some updates, ex. I can't trade, and some other glitches..
It's a 562 server, it's atomicScape..
Please Help! /:
Pm me, or post if u can help me! .. I got, TeamViewer, Skype, AIM & Facebook :-)
Regards
PKAR

item.title: Need help, to a 562!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

Just let me know if anything goes wrong , k? Always free to be helpful =P

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, to a 562!
item.dc:creator: @pkar pkar
item.description:
@pkar wrote:

ShinsakuDomo:

I will write here as others may have this problem too? I have not tried to use the moparscape server status page since '07, but the new one you go to ‘register server’ , fill out the form, and there you go =P

Ehm okay, i’ll try!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, to a 562!
item.dc:creator: @ShinsakuDomo ShinsakuDomo
item.description:
@ShinsakuDomo wrote:

I will write here as others may have this problem too? I have not tried to use the moparscape server status page since '07, but the new one you go to ‘register server’ , fill out the form, and there you go =P

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, to a 562!
item.dc:creator: @pkar pkar
item.description:
@pkar wrote:

[quote=“mopar fan, post:5, topic:373148”][quote author=pkar link=topic=469165.msg3430065#msg3430065 date=1292267459]

What?

I agree? I am not sure what is meant here…?

  1. You mean you need it available for download for other people? You can get your files into a download link for download by using : http://www.mediafire.com/ , http://www.megaupload.com/ , or search up some other uploading site…rapidshare is no longer good…

  2. Advertise it? You can post details about your server on different sites like http://www.google.com/ , or mopar’s server status page. This could get your server onto google. First ever private server I played I found on google and was posted on some site. Shibbyscape ( .no-ip.info ) I do not know what happened to that server…

  3. Searching around moparscape using its search function at the top of the page could help for specific things ( as the bugs could have been fixed, and some nice person posted a sort of how-to zu fix them. ) I can’t seem to find some of the good posts from around 2006-08 …not sure if that was from them being deleted, but lets hope the post your looking for was not deleted.

I’ve tried make a thread on here, i need to get it on google later, when all is fixed, yes correctly! … how i get it on Mediafire, Megaupload and that stuff…? :)…
[/quote]

You should not make a thread advertising your server here…But you can use this page: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php , better ones like http://www.google.com/status/index.php …not sure of others ones.[/quote]

I write PM…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help, to a 562!
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

[quote=“pkar, post:4, topic:373148”][quote author=mopar fan link=topic=469165.msg3430063#msg3430063 date=1292267342]

What?

I agree? I am not sure what is meant here…?

  1. You mean you need it available for download for other people? You can get your files into a download link for download by using : http://www.mediafire.com/ , http://www.megaupload.com/ , or search up some other uploading site…rapidshare is no longer good…

  2. Advertise it? You can post details about your server on different sites like http://www.google.com/ , or mopar’s server status page. This could get your server onto google. First ever private server I played I found on google and was posted on some site. Shibbyscape ( .no-ip.info ) I do not know what happened to that server…

  3. Searching around moparscape using its search function at the top of the page could help for specific things ( as the bugs could have been fixed, and some nice person posted a sort of how-to zu fix them. ) I can’t seem to find some of the good posts from around 2006-08 …not sure if that was from them being deleted, but lets hope the post your looking for was not deleted.
    [/quote]

I’ve tried make a thread on here, i need to get it on google later, when all is fixed, yes correctly! … how i get it on Mediafire, Megaupload and that stuff…? :)…[/quote]

You should not make a thread advertising your server here…unfortunately you cannot do that anymore here. But you can use this page: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php , better ones like http://www.google.com/status/index.php ( found on rune locus, not sure why it is changing it to google…) …I am not sure of others ones.

Mediafire:
I could not upload the images I had due to school computer uploading bug…so I will just explain it.

  1. Click the green button that says upload to mediafire without an account
  2. Select file you want.
  3. Click begin uploading files
  4. Should give you a link to your file so people can have a link for download of your files.
    If you get stuck there…give me a print screen of your screen. The school computers just say ‘upload stalled’ at that point so…

Read full topic

I’ve tried make a thread on here, i need to get it on RuneLocus later, when all is fixed, yes correctly! … how i get it on Mediafire, Megaupload and that stuff…? :)…
